emuInput.TitMainTitle: Crystal Harris wearing plaid jumper with light colored short sleeved blouse, posed behind table with paper and pencil, in Harris home, 7604 Mulford Street
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 22, 1956, pg. 3, reads: "Dear Santa - Bright-eyed and pensive Crystal Harris, 6, of 7604 Mulford St., is taxing her wit and her penmanship as she finishes her letter to Santa Claus at the North Pole. She is determined her stocking will be filled on Christmas morning.  Crystal is the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Charles (Teenie) Harris.  Remember when you when through this? - Harris Photo."
